content: the delicate light hat is a ribbed beanie knit in 1×1 rib it is worked from the bottom up in the round without seams the hat is knit with medium-weight yarn size * to fit actual head circumference adult medium 54-56cm/ 21 25- 22″ * finished height 21cm/ 8 25″ with the brim folded up 7cm 2 75″
